text: atah usake rab ne usaka achchhee sveekrti ke saath svaagat kiya aur uttam roop mein use paravaan chadhaaya; aur zakariya ko usaka sanrakshak banaaya. jab kabhee zakariya usake paas meharaab (ibaadatagaah) mein jaata, to usake paas kuchh rozee paata. usane kaha, "ai marayam! ye cheeze tujhe kahaan se milatee hai?" usane kaha, "yah allaah ke paas se hai." nissandeh allaah jise chaahata hai, behisaab deta hai
